t: Amazon.com : 3 x 680g Bear Brand Fortified Powdered Milk : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I thought I was getting 3 700g Bear Brand Powdered Milk but instead I received 3 900g + 100g! This is amazing because it usually cost $11 per 300g when I buy them on Sukli. I received a total of 3000g and if I buy this much on Sukli it would cost me $110. Sulit na sulit. Thank you! It came from Saipan, Mariana Islands so I waited a week to get it here in California but it's worth waiting for! I will buy again! ... Disclaimer: While we work to ensure that product ...
